item.title: Anti-Spoiler Measures?
item.content:encoded:
Just as a thought, perhaps on Quest pages we could list everything needed to complete the Quest at the top of the page? I know for me it is a pain trying to scroll through and check the requirements without reading all the text and turning the actual Quest into tedium.
(I would, of course, be willing to do much of the work in adding such a thing to extant pages.)
